Package org.jasig.cas.util

Various utility classes to generate unique ids and work with urls.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JsonSerializer<T>
    Interface to define operations needed to map objects from/to JSON clobs.
    LongNumericGenerator
    Interface to guaranteed to return a long.
    NumericGenerator
    Interface to return a new sequential number for each call.
    RandomStringGenerator
    Interface to return a random String.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCipherExecutor<T,R>
    Abstract cipher to provide common operations around signing objects.
    AbstractJacksonBackedJsonSerializer<T>
    Generic class to serialize objects to/from JSON based on jackson.
    AopUtils
    Utility class to assist with AOP operations.
    ApplicationContextProvider  
    BaseStringCipherExecutor
    This is BaseStringCipherExecutor.
    BinaryCipherExecutor
    A implementation that is based on algorithms provided by the default platform's JCE.
    CasSpringBeanJobFactory
    Creates quartz job, and autowires them based on the application context.
    CompressionUtils
    This is CompressionUtils that encapsulates common base64 calls and operations in one spot.
    CustomBeanValidationPostProcessor
    Provides a custom TraversableResolver that should work in JPA2 environments without the JPA2 restrictions (i.e.
    DefaultLongNumericGenerator
    The default numeric generator for generating long values.
    DefaultRandomStringGenerator
    Implementation of the RandomStringGenerator that allows you to define the length of the random part.
    DefaultUniqueTicketIdGenerator
    Default implementation of UniqueTicketIdGenerator.
    HostNameBasedUniqueTicketIdGenerator
    An implementation of UniqueTicketIdGenerator that is able auto-configure the suffix based on the underlying host name.
    HostNameBasedUniqueTicketIdGenerator.LoginTicketIdGenerator
    The type Login ticket id generator.
    HostNameBasedUniqueTicketIdGenerator.ProxyTicketIdGenerator
    The type Proxy ticket id generator.
    HostNameBasedUniqueTicketIdGenerator.ServiceTicketIdGenerator
    The type Service ticket id generator.
    HostNameBasedUniqueTicketIdGenerator.TicketGrantingTicketIdGenerator
    The type Ticket granting ticket id generator.
    ISOStandardDateFormat
    A fast date format based on the ISO-8601 standard.
    LdapUtils
    Utilities related to LDAP functions.
    LockedOutputStream
    Buffered output stream around a file that is exclusively locked for the lifetime of the stream.
    NoOpCipherExecutor
    No-Op cipher executor that does nothing for encryption/decryption.
    Pair<A,B>
    This class contains a pair of objects.
    PrivateKeyFactoryBean
    Factory Bean for creating a private key from a file.
    PseudoTransactionManager
    This is a PseudoTransactionManager, borrowed from spring-integration-core that serves as a mock NOOP transaction manager.
    PublicKeyFactoryBean
    FactoryBean for creating a public key from a file.
    RegexUtils
    Utility class to assist with resource operations.
    ShiroCipherExecutor
    A implementation that is based on algorithms provided by the default platform's JCE.
    SpringAwareMessageMessageInterpolator
    Configures the Validator to check the Spring Messages.
    TGCCipherExecutor
    This is TGCCipherExecutor that reads TGC keys from the CAS config and presents a cipher.
    WebflowCipherExecutor
    This is WebflowCipherExecutor, that reads webflow keys from CAS configuration and presents a cipher.

Package org.jasig.cas.util Description

Various utility classes to generate unique ids and work with urls.
Since:
3.0
